definition: to be fond of/to like/to enjoy/to be happy/to feel pleased/happiness/delight/glad
to feel/to move/to touch/to affect/feeling/emotion/(suffix) sense of ~

sentences.english: The point is to relax and enjoy the humor inherent in people not wearing pants.
sentences.chinese: 強調的放鬆並享受不穿褲子本身所蘊含的喜感。

definition: to amuse/to make sb laugh/to tease
unwell/indisposed/out of sorts/euphemism or honorific for ill
comical/funny/amusing/old pr. [gu3 ji1]/huaji, a form of comedy performance popular in Shanghai, Jiangsu and Zhejiang
(neologism) (of movies, songs etc) affecting/touching/moving/(of a person, esp. a woman) charming/cool
(neologism c. 2014) irresistibly quirky/compelling in its wackiness
to work as a carter or porter/to transport goods for a living (esp. by donkey)
comedic material/(in reference to a person) laughingstock/butt of jokes
